website_summaries.verdict: A crushable cowboy hat that is masterfully constructed from high-end materials to deliver long-lasting quality.
pros: Consists of 100% wool that delivers tremendous softness and versatility
Wired brim will maintain its shape both now and in the future
Leather band gives the hat a timeless look and feel
Requires only seconds to reshape the hat

customer_reviews.title: Great shape. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Nice and can bend in any shape you like. Very casual and a nice addition. Well packaged for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat for price
customer_reviews.text: I expected what this hat gave. It has a wire brim that can be easily adjusted over and over again. Its wool so it can get hot so it's a good winter hat. It does collect hair from animals quickly so a hair roller is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Corzine

customer_reviews.title: Great hat at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great hat at a great price. Sizing was a little off. I ordered a large based on the size chart, but I need a XL. I'll be ordering a new one and this one I will give to someone. Good looking hat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Hat. Can't beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who just started cowboy action shooting and fast draw competition. Fits just right (we used the guide provided). Good shape and quality. Real nice packaging too. Kept it safe throughout shipping process. He calls it his Walker Texas Ranger hat. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: The River Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: A fine quality hat and I am very happy with the product. Bought this to replace a 20 year old crushable Pendleton that I lost. My only complaint is that this hat does not deal as crushable as my old Pendleton. Still it is a very good fit and it is a great replacement that I wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: someone stole my package
customer_reviews.text: The delivery people gotta ring the doorbells because I was home all day and someone just stole the package right under my nose. They sent me another one though. It actually looks pretty dope and I'm glad they sent me another one. I honestly just bought this because I rode a horse once and I connected with my horse Sundance who inspired me to become a cowboy. It has a premium material feel at an affordable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Extra large is a bit larger
customer_reviews.text: I take a 7 5/8 inch hat that most would consider an extra large size. I ordered the extra large size Twister and it is a little bit larger than I expected. I put a felt insulation strip under the band and it fits well though. Very nice hat perfect for these cold winter days
customer_reviews.author: Hazen

customer_reviews.title: Such a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, near black in artificial light, but a deep and rich brown in natural light. Has garnered positive comments and low-price-sticker-shock. Initially a perfect fit, but has stretched a bit. A size smaller might have been too tight, so the fix is thin foam tape or, yup, rolled paper towels in the headband.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Loring

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit & feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit & feel, especially for the $$. Fits in my saddle bag & takes seconds to reshape. Wish they could make a summer version.
customer_reviews.author: Butler Designs

customer_reviews.title: Positive experience.
customer_reviews.text: While it is not quite what I was looking for, that is sticktly my own fault and not that of the seller. The hat arrived in a very timely manner and was exactly as described. My son is very happy with it and wears it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I ride and it can crush in the bag and come out with a little work you can't tell. My fit was perfect though the band was off center and some of the stitch came out of the edge but I have worn it every day since it arrived. Somehow it has been misplaced....not waiting to see if it turns up. Already ordered a new one.
customer_reviews.author: yozp  ono

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the money...and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hat! I got lots of compliments about this hat at a Halloween party. I would like to wear it at other times but although she thought I looked great, the wife says not when she’s around. She’s not a fan of western wear.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat for the price
customer_reviews.text: It fit well and looks good, seems like a nice hat. I just wish it were made in the USA instead of China.
customer_reviews.author: Rick101

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hat.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. This is my second one. Wear it every day, even in the rain. Looks good in the field and looks good for diner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday hats
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat the only problem was it was already bent into shape when I got it but if it was in shape it would have been a great past didn't want to take you to the store and get it shaped
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well-fitting.
customer_reviews.text: The hat fits true to size and is good-looking. The quality is nice for the price. It was shipped in a special hat box which protected it from damage. No surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Nutcracker

customer_reviews.title: Yee hah!
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this. It is comfortable. Perfect as a "social hat" that provides some shade. For social situations, I like a hat that is not as large as what I'd wear on a horse.
customer_reviews.author: angelsix

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in an Envelope
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hat but it was shipped in an envelope. Yes it is a crushable hat but it arrived pretty mangled and did not make much of a first impression
customer_reviews.author: Jon Vetten

customer_reviews.title: Fine hat
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat. It is a kind of dressy/casual style that I enjoy wearing. The fit is good and the hat holds its shape really well.
customer_reviews.author: Steba

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, well made, ultra functional hat. Steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I am well pleased with this hat. I have been looking for a cowboy hat but most are pricey. This is a very good hat for the price. Fits well and looks good. Would recommend anyone looking for a everyday hat or even a hat to wear with a suit to buy this one. It is a really good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my adult son. He loves the fit and quality, and is proud of the appearance on him! I give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cook in Cajun Country

customer_reviews.title: Hat is good quality but I clearly ordered a brown one and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hat is good quality but I clearly ordered a brown one and received a black one. It's not enough for me to send it back but a little disapppinted getting the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday hat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat for the price. Fits well and is easy to reform. Great every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 yr old granddaughter who thinks she’s Amy on Heartland.lol She loves it! Great quality! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fishing hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat predominantly for fishing. I’m not a cowboy. I live in Minnesota and spend time in Wisconsin. I felt hat like this is perfect for spring, winter and fall. It’s too hot in the summer to do anything in this hat. Waterproof makes it good for fishing, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: awesome hat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really awesome hat. The large fits me perfectly and it is beautiful! I love the look and the feel. It's very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: kevboy

customer_reviews.title: Good thing is it won't blow off in a wind
customer_reviews.text: May return for larger size, seems a little to me. Good thing is it won't blow off in a wind. Nice looking hat though.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother in-law, he LOVES it. Great hat for price.
customer_reviews.author: M RUSSELL COWAN

customer_reviews.title: Great hat.
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for the money. I have the brown and black one. Perfect for any occasion. Make sure you known your size . I wear a 7.5 in cowboy hats that come with the actual size which is considered a large. This hat is only in four sizes small, med., large & x-larger. Get the x-large unless you like them tight on your head. I like mine a little lose. Sweat a lot. Well worth this small price.
customer_reviews.author: richard whitt

customer_reviews.title: Quality hat at exceotional value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat and is now my favorite. Fits and looks great. Exceptional value for a quality made hat. Got the dark brown and will be purchasing the black soon.
customer_reviews.author: REA

customer_reviews.title: Flexible hat.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the receiver was very happy. He was impressed with fit, flexibility, and durability. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary H

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rugged sturdy and comfortable. Good fall or winter hat. A bit too thick for summer, but love it!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great product it’s just a little small
customer_reviews.text: Great product it’s just a little small. I think it’ll stretch to fit once I start wearing it all the time. I will be buying another later 5his year.
customer_reviews.author: Toyodie

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really nice hat. Fits as expected. Good quality for price. Very protected packaging. Shipped and received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yee-haw to the quality
customer_reviews.text: This is legit you can go full yee-haw with this on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat to be a work hat. It was snowing the day it came and I wore it while I did some work around the house. It shed the water and ice well. This is a nice, heavy duty felt that wears well. I am very happy with this hat. It is a great bargain for the money.
customer_reviews.author: H. Allen Inness

customer_reviews.title: Instant charm. Just insert head
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. Everyone thinks I'm so sexy 🌶 with it
customer_reviews.author: Snow Muncher

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is perfect! Not too expensive and not one of those over-the-top western hats. This thing is perfect for a subtle hat that is not too in your face.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan King

customer_reviews.title: very nice hat. I guess the hatbands are randomly selected ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice hat. I guess the hatbands are randomly selected and the one I got is probably not my first choice, but the hat is just what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: ... 7 1/4 hat size and the medium was a perfect
customer_reviews.text: The first time I buy a hat that fits I am a 7 1/4 hat size and the medium was a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: ojoprieto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I put the hat on my head, it was the most comfortable I've felt! The rims around the hat can be shaped into whatever style you want it to be! I haven't worn it in the rain yet, but I'm sure it will endure! Although it says brown as one of the colors you can choose from, it's actually a darker brown. I love this hat! I have no regrets buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fits great would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fits great would highly recommend. I have a larger head than most and hats are always too small this was great.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can’t beat the price. Fits my size 7 1/2 noggin.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Craigie

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking hat. Very durable, and price was great. Have looked at similar hats that cost quite a bit more. Delivered right on time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: excellent hat
customer_reviews.text: Great hat. Looks good. Chocolate brown color is perfect. I'll get another hat band at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory John Scherzinger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hat
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected! I thought it would be a good starter hat and it turns out to be a high quality, very comfortable hat. If you are looking at buying a crushable cowboy hat, this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Derek H.

customer_reviews.title: Medium would have been a better fit since the hat runs larger than the hat ...
customer_reviews.text: Large is very large. Medium would have been a better fit since the hat runs larger than the hat size. Well packed and shipped fast, just a bit too large. Good winter hat.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Garafola

customer_reviews.title: Suave and Debonair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat very much!!! Fits perfectly and looks great!! The price is very reasonable too and customer service is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: BookAce

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and fits perfectly. Very good quality. Form fitting is easy. Measure your noodle properly! Better to over estimate because you can pad to fit. Hope this helps...
customer_reviews.author: Tubbs McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what my husband was looking for. Fits just right. Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with this hat
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this hat. The shape is nicer than I expected. And while the crown is shorter than I expected, the trade off is a nice, low silhouette. The hat fits well--not too tight, not too lose, though I expect to have to hold onto it in a stiff wind. It's felt, so it needs a little grooming now and then to keep looking sharp. Because it's felt, its a bit warm for summer--but i wear it anyway. i like the solid shade it gives my fair, skin-cancer-prone skin. And I don't find it terribly uncomfortable even in 90+ degree heat.
customer_reviews.author: R. V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NIce hat - fits well. Delivered promptly and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He wears a 7 1/4 and I purchased a large and it fits him perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He wears a 7 1/4 and I purchased a large and it fits him perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya N.

customer_reviews.title: Yep...this did it!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and practical for travel! Would like a black one! And a white one! And a red one.....
customer_reviews.author: amsvd

customer_reviews.title: great hat
customer_reviews.text: we were going to a country western party and this hat was perfect for my husband. True to size and a nice quality hat.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat; it's my first cowboy hat; it's quite wonderful
customer_reviews.author: LARRY DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Just put a piece of cord behind the sweat band and great fit.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just a little larger than expected. I would estimate it is 1/8 larger than expected. Just put a piece of cord behind the sweat band and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Erniepc1

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Worth the reactions.
customer_reviews.text: My ex loved his hat. It fitted like a glove. Overall: quality was nicely made
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Loureiro

customer_reviews.title: Black hat=black band, NOT brown
customer_reviews.text: I just received this hat in the mail but am very upset that the band is black on black hat, when description says brown band on black hat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Looks expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat for the price! Looks like you paid a lot more for it. Perfect for my Westworld cosplay!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good for city girls too.
customer_reviews.text: A great hat. I bought it for my wife and it looks great, mixes well with a leather jacket and other outfits . Also warm!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Moving to Colorado and wanted something western but understated. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ricoman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hat made with quality materials for a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hat made with quality materials for a fantastic price. Good introductory hat for someone who's looking at cowboy hats.
customer_reviews.author: Raul D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband and he loves the why it fits.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hat is awesome, near Stetson quality at much less., very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: William D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Style
customer_reviews.text: Just great for my style good service and fast delivery thx!
customer_reviews.author: Jorma Pulliainen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it. Got it as a Christmas gift for him. I may even order one for myself... :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for value
customer_reviews.text: It's a great hat for the money. It fits good and it looks good. That's about all I need in a hat.
customer_reviews.author: JK46

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hat!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It fit perfect, and i have a hard time finding ones hats that fit right. Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: A Golden Family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat that goes with everything! It fits perfectly and has the right price for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Crusch

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: Price is right, fit is right. Not a bad choice
customer_reviews.author: Heide Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The hat is wonderful and I got alot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: The hat is wonderful and I got alot of compliments. Very good quality for the money! Much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for a family western party. Its great quality. The fit is great. He got a size large. We measured his head to make sure it would be the right size prior to ordering it. It's great that you can fold it up as well because we will be traveling with it. The detail looks great and good quality. If your looking for a hat for a not reasonable price this is the hat for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lasiter

customer_reviews.title: Love the hat!
customer_reviews.text: Love love loved it! Especially because you can mould it to the way you like it to be worn!
customer_reviews.author: A. N

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect order. Fit as expected. Super Nice for the price. I’m stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Now we have great matching hats.
customer_reviews.text: I had one and it blew off the mountain. Friend has one just like it, bought one for me and her husband. They are nice looking hats and are consistent. 3 amigos...
customer_reviews.author: William I Hegeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hat is great, it fit my head as expected and is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Worker bee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hat
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my husband was looking for. It fits perfectly and is quite attractive. Good quality hat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Gheesling

customer_reviews.title: great hat
customer_reviews.text: fast ship. great price. first bought a tan color and was told I needed brown. everyone likes it. nice and warm on a cold day. brown color doesn't show the dirt when I wear it into the woods.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hugh Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: More than pleased with my purchase for the price I would recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beard

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a cowboy hat!
customer_reviews.text: Love my hat. Fits comfortably and the style is smoking!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hat is in good condition and fit, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wai Kuen Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and I am extremely pleased with this hat. It fits just right and is very comfortable even when wearing it all day. It is also great when its raining out side because it is water resistant. I would definitely recommend buying this hat if you like the cowboy style.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: This was bought for a cancer patient who was losing ...
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a cancer patient who was losing his hair and could not wear a baseball cap to work. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Momovich

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Good hat for the cool weather and just what I expected for the price. This is not a dress hat but more of a day to day work hat or a hat to wear outside when the weather is cool but not cold. The sizing appears to be correct and the quality looks good as well. Have only worn once on a cool morning. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Climate

customer_reviews.title: XL sized hats the large is perfect. Not the case with this hat
customer_reviews.text: Usually with S, M, L, XL sized hats the large is perfect. Not the case with this hat, it is small and will need some stretching. Not worth my time to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J.

customer_reviews.title: Buy the hat and get a different band.
customer_reviews.text: The hat itself is a very nice hat for the price. Its warm and seems durable. It fit exactly as expected. It was packed nicely and the box showed no damage. The hat band however was the issue. To be up front, I had no intention of keeping the hat band when I ordered it. I was just going to replace it. Regardless, the band that arrived with it, for starters, was not as pictured. It came with a cheap tacky band that was already in shambles from poor stitching and bad glue. That being said, buy this for the hat alone and get a decent band to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Myd

customer_reviews.title: Good hat
customer_reviews.text: A nice hat. It gets harder to shape each time it gets crushed. This is good to keep in mind if you have kids who want to wear daddy's hat.
customer_reviews.author: JC's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Very good hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is very good quality and came 7 days EARLY!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The hat looks really nice but I bought it for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: The hat looks really nice but I bought it for my grandson. I'm not sure if he loves it or not yet but will find out.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G Lozon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat I ordered a brown one and a second one in black.Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: BooBoo

customer_reviews.title: itz good, i like
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality hat, looks nice and its made well. only complaint i have with it is it was a little snug on my head, but then again i have a large head.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Shelby

product_meta.title: Twister Men's Crushable Dakota Hat
product_meta.description: Show off your western style with this Twister western hat by M & F Western Products. Brown leather hatband with Twister pin. Handcrafted from premium materials. Crown 4" and Brim 2-3/4". S (6-3/4" x 6-7/8"), M (7" x 7-1/8"), L (7-1/4" x 7-3/8"), XL (7-1/2" x 7-5/8").
